DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Insulin Aspart Subjects With Type 1 Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 1 2 diabetes least 4 week Treatment oral antidiabetic drug ( OADs ) and/or insulin least 4 week HbA1c : 7.513.5 % Body Mass Index ( BMI ) : 1835 kg/m2 Treatment either soluble human insulin insulin NPH three time daily within 3 month trial participation History drug abuse alcohol dependence
